alert.note: Alert for Iron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 07 at 8:25AM EDT until May 11 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Michigan... Paint River at Crystal Falls (Paint) affecting Iron County. ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Sturgeon River near Chassell affecting Houghton and Baraga Counties. Michigamme River near Crystal Falls (Michigamme) affecting Iron County. Sturgeon River near Nahma Junction affecting Delta County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Elevated river levels caused by excessive rainfall continue. * WHERE...Paint River at Crystal Falls (Paint). * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 5.5 feet, 3500 - cfs - River exceeds bankfull stage * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:10 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 5.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 6.0 feet this evening. - Action stage is 5.5 feet. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Report observed flooding to the National Weather Service in Marquette and local emergency services when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/marquette. The next statement will be issued by this evening at 900 PM CDT /1000 PM EDT/.
